On top of that, $DOT  now has a 2.1B supply cap, significantly reducing long-term inflation.  No hype, no noise just a structural change that improves how Polkadot actually works.  Updates like this tend to matter more over time than most people expect. #BTC Price Analysis#  #Altcoin Season#
